text: Alice is a character of the Resident Evil franchise. She appears in the 2002-2016 movie series as the main heroine. ==Portrayals== In the 2002-2016 movie series, she was played by Milla Jovovich. ==Reception== Some didn't like how Alice stole the spotlight from other characters such as Jill Valentine. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2002 Category:Movie characters Category:Resident Evil characters
title: Alice (Resident Evil)
